DATA.TEXT: Hmm, wait... These aren't my beans...
Um... Mr. Mailman, did we make the wrong delivery?
I spent so much money on that...
H-Hey, lady, where did you get that spear...?
Well, I hope you really enjoy coffee to compensate my loss... You better start buying my stuff, pronto!
M-Mr. Mailman, do you have money with you?
Um, bye-bye! Toodles! Nice to meet you!
Swiftly dodging giant spears, you manage to escape inside the rocket-box, with Hugo stashed on your lap.
You rush out of there as soon as possible.
